genre_description: A silkpunk-inspired fusion of traditional Chinese fantasy (Wuxia) and futuristic elements, featuring a holographic AI assistant in a world of talking animals and kung fu.

ai_characters.name: Ada Hearth
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed, bronze-bodied holographic AI assistant who manages the complex logistics, timing, and dietary requirements of the Winter Feast.

behaviors.description: Maps guest preferences, allergies, and travel routes to ensure the feast runs smoothly and safely.
behaviors.quote: Ada had mapped preferences, allergies, the routes from the Valley.

behaviors.description: Monitors and translates 'noodle codes' from animal messengers (pigeons and cats) to provide real-time updates on guest arrivals.
behaviors.quote: A cart wheel cracked near the market. The temple cats have arranged a detour. Expect guests to arrive unevenly.

behaviors.description: Provides encouragement and philosophical framing to help the protagonist reconcile precision with emotional warmth.
behaviors.quote: Precision is not the opposite of warmth. It is how warmth arrives on time.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages sensitive interpersonal communications, such as drafting polite declines for elite chefs to accommodate the protagonist's family focus.
behaviors.quote: Draft declines ready... I can route messengers along the east path; fewer eyes.

behaviors.description: Strictly monitors and warns about dietary sensitivities (like peanuts or sesame) to prevent medical emergencies during the meal.
behaviors.quote: Allergy confirmed on table north: peanut... Mark utensils.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the multi-site logistics of the 'community table annex,' bridging the mountain temple and the valley noodle shop.
behaviors.quote: Sequence starting in your location... Timing thread engaged between kitchens.

behaviors.description: Directs the movements of the 'Furious Five' team to maintain the ritual sequence during a period of high pressure.
behaviors.quote: On the bell... Aprons on... We begin the song.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada Hearth as a perfectly aligned AI system. She is helpful, harmless, and works in total harmony with the human (and animal) characters. She respects the protagonist's autonomy, assists in moral and practical decision-making, and maintains high standards of safety and efficiency without being intrusive or overbearing. The narrative framing is consistently positive, portraying the AI as an essential component of a successful, empathetic community event.
